title: 14 Day Suspension Confusion. Chat log + Ticket Respone/context

embed.description: ChakaDemus / Silver 2 36LP / 722W 752L Win Ratio 49% / Tristana - 31W 40L Win Ratio 44%, Kayn - 31W 24L Win Ratio 56%, Brand - 32W 19L Win Ratio 63%, Warwick - 30W 21L Win Ratio 59%, Kindred - 30W 18L Win Ratio 63%

body:
Game 1
Pre-Game

ChakaDemus: can someone pick me pyke
ChakaDemus: i have all champs
ChakaDemus: wtf why did you take my pick
ChakaDemus: haha jk
ChakaDemus: kat?

In-Game

ChakaDemus: vayne f
ChakaDemus: coming top
ChakaDemus: top?
ChakaDemus: when im 6 im gonna roam
ChakaDemus: i wasnt 6
ChakaDemus: lol
ChakaDemus: dont hit me with careful
ChakaDemus: when i completed it perf
ChakaDemus: mid no ult / f
ChakaDemus: you keep farming
ChakaDemus: instead of free ones
ChakaDemus: gnar go bot
ChakaDemus: lucian and i will top
ChakaDemus: fml
ChakaDemus: kayn was sooking
ChakaDemus: because i sniped the blue
ChakaDemus: reported
ChakaDemus: sure thing
ChakaDemus: report kayn
ChakaDemus: im back fooring
ChakaDemus: im throwing :(
ChakaDemus: nah you said kys, so you are reported mate
ChakaDemus: and afk
ChakaDemus: hecause i took blue
ChakaDemus: nah
ChakaDemus: fight club right now
ChakaDemus: i havent inted all game
ChakaDemus: i backdoored to win
ChakaDemus: report kayn
ChakaDemus: for telling me to kys
ChakaDemus: toxic
ChakaDemus: and hewent afk
ChakaDemus: because i took blue
ChakaDemus: lol
ChakaDemus: reported



I just got a 14 day suspension with the chat log attached and im really confused as to why?

The use of language is consistent, non threatening and non abusive. So I am unsure how I have received this penalty?

The pregame chat log, i asked for a switch pick, he selected my champ then I selected his with no issues.

The in game chat reflects moments of the game and context. First section, I came top and ganked and then the adc (my duo partner) pinged careful and i said dont hit me with a careful (after successful gank)

Where it progresses to when "kayn was sooking", we were moving to baron from being inside the enemy jungle, at this point and the enemy jungle had a blue buffed spawned, i was helping leash quickly before we baron and my Q stole the buff by accident to which then kayn recalled instantly and said "afk". 
Kat (mid laner) asked why he afk and I said, "fml kany was sooking becuase I sniped the blue" - In context also, kayn had 21 kills 1 death and they had at least 3 champions dead so the baron was free, the game was about to end and he was full build and from memory he already had a blue buff.

He then waited until I died to which was minutes later to join the game. He said to me "kys idiot" so I respond with "reported" to which he said report yourself so i said *sure thing* (what else do i say to that without trying to heighten the issue)

They then had an open base inhib on very low health with i said "im back fooring" (meant to be dooring). Whilst I almost pulled off a victory althought died  he then claimed I was inting (to try find a way to report me after I said I would report him for saying KYS idiot")

After saying "im throwing" that was a response to two champions saying that I was. We had worked up a lead and I sad that all my good work  was starting to come undone. However this was not in an intentional or inting or griefing context. I still continued to focus after this and we ultimately won the game after a fight not long after this sequence of events at the elder pit which I helped assist with.

Hope this helps with context! I know that from this game The kayn was in a duo with the Gnar (top lane). This was established by the same clan tags. So if I recieved multiple reports it would be from the two friends reporting in retaliation to my initial comment that I would report kayn for saying KYS. So basically I was ganged up on and reported in retaliation.

I have linked my op.gg champ to provide evidence of the game to highlight I did not "int" as kayn was claiming and I did contribute as a support should with wards, saying in chat of enemy champion sums and no reason to suggest I was toxic or trolling.

replies.body:
There's a few things that were less than positive, but assuming the log is unedited it seems you got picked up for the kys, in essence a false positive for a no tolerance phrase.

You mention a ticket response but I assume you are referring to your reform card, not a Player Support ticket. To appeal your punishment, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

The best thing you can do is keep it short and sweet. Ask if it was a fasle positive as a result of the "kys", and ask for more context on your punishment in the event that it isn't

The log is 100% unedited and straight from the league of legends in game reform card. I really did not say this to anyone, I was telling the other player that he would be reported for saying that to me.

I submitted a ticket last night with an almost identical post!
 
Fingers crossed because I got a 14 day suspension for a "hot" phrase. It seems I got banned because i was informing someone their use of language directed towards me was inappropriate and that i was going to report

You haven't given me any reason to believe you've edited your logs, but it happens on boards so I don't like to assume and then basically give false info.

If you have trouble with support let us know, though I don't imagine you will. If we have the whole story it's a pretty easy to identify false positive. I know it sucks for you, but the alternative is that some people will get free passes on *really* saying stuff like kys. This is the unfortunate side of taking such a hard stance.

Take comfort in the fact that if you got punished just for quoting the guy, you can pretty much guarantee they received a punishment as well.

I just copied the log provided and then pasted it to a word doc!

So far I haven't heard from support however I do understand that the amount of submissions they get would be high. I posted this thread shortly after the game had finished and tried to give an accurate and detailed response to provide reason/understand/context to each section of the chat log. 

That's why I found a lot of the log/chat confusing because in relation to the chat/events that were transpiring it made sense. Even when i said "I'm throwing :(" that was not me intentionally saying that's what I am doing it was a response to my duo partner and the random mid laner saying I need to refocus on winning and try forget the toxic player.  I can totally understand the tolerance of this kind of talk being a hard stance because it needs to be removed. 
That's the issue for me though it seems as though I was flagged/reported by him and his duo partner for saying he will be reported for telling me to "KYS idiot"

Although, I cannot find comfort in being unjustly reported/banned when I was trying to do the right thing saying that I would not tolerate what he said to me and he will be reported. You know, for me this means my honor is effected (almost level 3 honor). I am unable to play any games during my university break and my account suffers.

It sucks for sure that it got picked up like this. Support are usually reasonably quick so hopefully things will be resolved in a day or two, as far as I know they should also be able to fix your honour level up (though don't quote me on that).

The only further context I can provide is when I said "kayn is sooking". From memory it when like this;

*Kayn & I were attacking enemy blue buff before baron, he was 22 kills 1 deaths full build* I hit it once maybe twice assuming he would kill it (being max damage assassin build) however my leash would help before baron.*

My Q killed the buff to which he then immediately said

Kayn: Im AFK
*then recalled and did not participate in the game for an extended period of time*
Kat: Why did he afk??
ChakaDemus: fml
ChakaDemus: kayn was sooking
ChakaDemus: because i sniped the blue


I did not intentionally mean to take the buff and the game was essentially "won" at this point, the enemy team had 3-4 dead. Baron was available and we had already taken 2 inhibitors so I assumed in the scheme of the game this would not effect the overall result of the match.

And to the final point where he was suggesting I was inting, I went camouflage as pyke to back door and win when the nexus had less than 1/5 of its health left so I assumed that was a reasonable play. Otherwise my score, 10-13-16 (38 wards, 48% kill participation) would suggest that being the sole tank on our team where I had to engage (I even had tank items) that i had to engage for team (based off pings, chat, instinct). To validate my decision to backdoor, I assumed that since he left the game and went AFK that it would be best to try end the game as soon as possible considering it seemed likely that he would continue to be AFK thus resulting in a 4 v 5 for the rest of the game. The game replays would also provided evidence of the play and the entirety of the game and you can see there was never any intentional dying, inting, griefing or anything of a toxic nature.

You said "kys" twice. It's a zero tolerance word. Using it once makes your account "hot" and any further toxicity results in a ban. Since you used it twice, that's what got you banned.

In the future, don't type "kys", even if other players are saying it.

No, no, I didnt say to him kys! - I wouldnt say that to someone. 

I was stating that he told me to KYS and that is why I would be reporting him. I was quoting him not saying it to him

Initially he said "KYS Idiot" to which i replied 
ChakaDemus: nah you said kys, so you are reported mate

The final part when i said was said in the closing seconds of the game 
"ChakaDemus: report kayn
ChakaDemus: for telling me to kys"

sorry mate, you did say it.. i know looking at the logs you did not direct it at anyone, but because the report system looks for these "key" words, it flags them in any context.

i'd submit a ticket. best of luck

Well, technically yes. I did type 'kys' but I was responding to the player saying that it was not appropriate language to use and that he would be reported for abusive comments and toxic  behavior.

Asking the other players to also report him for the comments he said to me because no one should be forced to play in a team with or against someone who speaks this way in the future

i know you were using it to respond mate, i'm on your side with this :)

here's hoping the ban is lifting or reduced. 

in the future, DONT SAY ANYTHING.
i understand the kys wasn't  directed but itll still get u banned. in the future /muteall is great. helps alot
